ResearchProjectDef.label: Neurostimulators
ResearchProjectDef.description: Create neurostimulators which enhance learning speed of pawns inside growth vats the machines are attached to.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Neurostimulators
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to assemble VR simulators and, advanced machines that greatly enhance learning speed of pawns inside growth vats in a radius around them and allow them to recieve passions and traits.
